rows.text: Awards: Winner of the "Antonio Barbero" Revelation Award at the 1965 Cinema Writers Circle Awards for Best Director (José Luis Borau)
Italian National Syndicate of Film Journalists
Awards: 2nd place at the National Syndicate of Spectacle in 1966
The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Awards: 2nd place for Best Action Performance (Clint Eastwood) at the 1968 Laurel Awards.
Django, Kill... If You Live, Shoot!
A Minute to Pray, a Second to Die
Italian/West German production. Billy Joe Cudlip (Lee Van Cleef) becomes a sheriff in order to steal a silver shipment, but circumstances make him act his position.
God Made Them... I Kill Them
If You Meet Sartana Pray for Your Death
A Sky Full of Stars for a Roof

Italian/USA production. When Cacopoulos (Eli Wallach) is saved from being hanged, he robs local outlaws Cat Stevens (Terrence Hill) and Hutch Bessy (Bud Spencer) and uses the money for revenge against his old partners who betrayed him.
Once Upon a Time in the West
Spain. A cowboy has a twin brother who is a leader of a group of raiding Comanches.
Kill Them All and Come Back Alone
Shadow of Sartana... Shadow of your Death
I Am Sartana Your Angel of Death
One Damned Day at Dawn… Django Meets Sartana!
I'll Forgive You, Before I Kill You
Sartana's Here... Trade Your Pistol for a Coffin
Sartana in the Valley of Death
Have a Good Funeral, My Friend... Sartana Will Pay
Django and Sartana Are Coming... It's the End
Light the Fuse... Sartana Is Coming
And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave
Vengeance Is a Dish Served Cold
A gunfighter (Gianni Garko) is hired to prove the innocence of outlaw Chester Conway (Klaus Kinski).
Joe Clifford (Anthony Steffen), a traveling actor and part-time hired gunman, inherits a gold mine from his uncle.
Two women, Louise (Brigitte Bardot) and Marie Sarrazin (Claudia Cardinale) fight over the deed to an oil ranch.
Jesse and Lester, Two Brothers in a Place Called Trinity
made in 1970 West Germany, shot in Negev Desert, Israel. Trivia - Sunshine's gun is the same Mauser that was used to build Han Solo's blaster in Star Wars. ref- imdb.com.
J & S: Criminal Story of an Outlaw Couple
Too Much Gold for One Gringo
The West Is Tough, Amigo... Alleluja's Here
Go Away! Trinity Has Arrived in Eldorado
The Return of Clint the Stranger
Three outlaws (Michael Forest, Fred Harrison, Paolo Gozlino) inadvertently help a local banker planning to evict farmers by robbing a train carrying their mortgage payments to the bank.
A Reason to Live, a Reason to Die
Ringo (Fabio Testi) encounters an Indian hunting the ten men who burned his village and killed the inhabitants.
The White, the Yellow, and the Black
The Stranger (Tony Anthony) finds himself between two warring families in Japan. Filmed in 1968 not released until 1975 due to a dispute between Allan Klien and MGM.
A Genius, Two Partners and an Idiot

In the third and final Spaghetti Western directed by Lucio Fulci, bounty hunter Roy Blood (Montgomery Wood) becomes involved in a plot to kidnap the nephew of the land baron who had his father killed when he was a boy.
